These Pics Of Varun, Madhuri & Katrina Prove Their Holi Was The Right Mix Of Crazy & Classy!
These Pics Of Varun, Madhuri & Katrina Prove Their Holi Was The Right Mix Of Crazy & Classy!
Holi as a festival is all about chilling, splashing colors and gorge on unlimited sweets apart from spreading love, peace and happiness. From commoners to celebrities, everyone goes in a party mode and rightly so!
Twitter
Right from Varun Dhawan, Madhuri Dixit to Siddharth Malhotra, everyone celebrated this day with filled with love and happiness.
Varun Dhawan posted the picture of himself with girlfriend Natasha Dalal which went viral within minutes. The actor has openly spoken about his love for Natasha and has no qualms in making his relationship public anymore. Rumour has it, the couple will soon tie the knot. Don’t they look just lovely together?
Instagram
While Madhuri Dixit’s Holi looked super special with her entire family. The actress shared a beautiful picture of herself with her hubby and kids, she looked gorgeous with her million dollar smile.
Don't Miss 207 SHARES 161 SHARES 699 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES
Sidharth Malhotra looked a bit high with enthusiasm. He shared the video of himself enjoying the Holi rhythm playing in his head. Looks like the actor thoroughly enjoyed the Holi party.
A day to let loose, spread love & add a splash of colour to our lives! Wishing everyone a happy and joyful Holi ❤ 🌈 #HappyHoli pic.twitter.com/X5KgvBQjnl — Sidharth Malhotra (@SidMalhotra) March 21, 2019
Sunny Leone posted a picture with hubby Daniel Weber and her three adorable kids. The picture will definitely give you family goals.
Apart from them, Katrina Kaif had a glamorous one as she attended the Zoom Holi party looking nothing short of a princess. She looked ravishing to say the least.
Take a look at all the pictures of Bollywood celebs celebrating Holi.
Twitter
Arjun Rampal was papped with girlfriend Gabriella celebrating their first Holi together.
Wishing everyone a happy and safe Holi! #HappyHoli pic.twitter.com/ekWCcj3kwW — Saiyami Kher (@SaiyamiKher) March 21, 2019
